title: person
body: need tho send lollogs.zip folder to someone

replies.body: You can drag and drop those logs into a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you're trying to send them to our techs to look over.
how do i find the things though, thats wat i need help with

Ahhhh my apologies! If you use the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) it can create those logs for you, I believe they should goto the desktop by default.
how can i get into a live chat again? i was in it before but now i cant send him the files
Live isn't on 24/7, but when it is you should be able to find the button for it next to Submit when you're making a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) the usual way.
how do i find the things though, thats wat i need help with, help?
